## Code

Finding the files replace directory for find with the appropriate directory for your setup.
Also change below in R code.

```
find ~/projects/phrmwg-cdisc/rdf.cdisc.org -name "*.rdf" -o -name "*.owl" -o -name "*.ttl"
```

```{r, results='asis', eval=TRUE}

library (rrdf)

cdisc_rdf = new.rdf(ontology=FALSE)
# change as appropriate
cdisc_files_dir= "/home/ma/projects/phrmwg-cdisc/"
cdisc_files_dir= "/home/ma/projects/phrmwg/rdf-cdisc-org-store/"



load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/resources/w3.org/skos.rdf", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/resources/dublincore.org/dcam.rdf", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/resources/dublincore.org/dcelements.rdf", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/resources/dublincore.org/dcterms.rdf", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/terminology-2013-06-28/glossary-terminology.owl", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/terminology-2013-06-28/cdash-terminology.owl", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/terminology-2013-06-28/sdtm-terminology.owl", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/terminology-2013-06-28/qs-terminology.owl", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/terminology-2013-06-28/send-terminology.owl", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/terminology-2013-06-28/adam-terminology.owl", sep=""), appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/std/sdtm-1-2.ttl", sep=""), format="TURTLE", appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/std/all-standards.ttl", sep=""), format="TURTLE", appendTo= cdisc_rdf )

load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/std/sdtmig-3-1-2.ttl", sep=""), format="TURTLE", appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/std/adamig-1-0.ttl", sep=""), format="TURTLE", appendTo= cdisc_rdf )
load.rdf(paste0(cdisc_files_dir, "rdf.cdisc.org/std/sendig-3-0.ttl", sep=""), format="TURTLE", appendTo= cdisc_rdf )

cdisc_out = save.rdf(cdisc_rdf, filename="cdisc-rdf.ttl", format="TURTLE")

print(summarize.rdf(cdisc_rdf))
```
